data.text: Long story short, I'm my own lawyer now.
And bitch, me being your client, aren't you supposed to ask for the most lenient form of punishment first? Cos bitch, d'I tell you that I have that kinda money?
Bitch goes ahead and asks for maximum fine and maximum period of probation. Like "whoaaaaaaa bitch, are you supposed to consult me (your client) about such shit before you speak on my behalf.
And when it was time for mitigation, bitch coulda argued how I'm such an upstanding citizen, my good nature, my good qualities but noooooo
Bro. I coulda walked, I had a good 99% cos the prosecution had nothing and all evidence on the table was in my favour but nooooooo, this "professional" lawyer threw me under the bus.
This bitch literally played my defense into the hands of the prosecution
No. Actually, I pleaded guilty to the first charge cos I didn't stand a chance on that one. But the second charge I had all the evidence in my corner but
I was found guilty in two cases while I had legal representation and found not guilty in the one case I represented myself.
